Uses of Class
org.restsql.core.SqlResourceException

  • Packages that use SqlResourceException 
    Package Description
    org.restsql.core
    Contains core framework interfaces, an API for deployments that use restSQL as a library, rather than an HTTP service.
    org.restsql.core.impl
    Contains core framework implementation.
    org.restsql.core.impl.mysql  
    org.restsql.core.impl.postgresql  
    org.restsql.core.impl.serial  
    org.restsql.core.sqlresource
    Contains classes that model the SQL Resource definition XML document.
    org.restsql.service
    Contains HTTP interface classes.

    • Uses of SqlResourceException in org.restsql.core.sqlresource

      Methods in org.restsql.core.sqlresource that throw SqlResourceException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SqlResourceDefinitionUtils.validate(SqlResourceDefinition definition)
      Throws SqlResourceException if definition meets one of the following criteria: No query element No metadata element No database element with default database name No Parent table element More than one Parent, Child or Join table elements
